title: Fish cakes with parsley sauce
description: This recipe uses cod, salmon and haddock fillets, but you could use any fish you like to make these easy fishcakes, coated in breadcrumbs and served with a classic parsley sauce.
ingredients: flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ well-scrubbed lemon, finely grated zest
6 spring onions, trimmed and finely sliced
reserved milk from cooking the fish
25g/1oz bunch curly leaf parsley, tough stalks removed and leaves finely chopped
